title: Bug Splat
body: I keep getting a bug splat. I tried redownloading, repair, and checked to see if its blocked by my firewall. No matter what I do, I get stuck with the stupid bug splat. Anyone else have any suggestions?

replies.body: Found the problem. It was the system. If you are using windows 10, the xbox feature has a recording option in settings. If it's on, it causes the bug splat consistently.

Since a new patch went out, first ensure this isn't caused by a third-party program (such as Lolrecorder or plays.tv) by [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3). If you still encounter issues, this is likely tied to your system drivers or hardware causing poor interactions with the client. This can typically be resolved by working through our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so give those steps a go!

Let me know if this helped.
